title: GENERAL
fullText:
Transformers  shall  be  installed  in  accordance  with  Clauses 4.14.2 to 4.14.5.
Exception: The following transformers need not comply with this Clause:
1	An instrument transformer.
2	An extra-low voltage transformer.
3	A luminous discharge tube transformer.
4	A transformer incorporated in a motor starter or other similar electrical equipment.
